alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 6:23PM CDT until June 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rio, or 10 miles west of Columbus, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbus, Poynette, Fall River, Rio, Arlington, Otsego and Doylestown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
